医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示丹佛青少年无家可归率惊人今天发表在《儿科》杂志上的第一项此类研究对科罗拉多州丹佛市青少年无家可归情况进行了全面评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-youth-homeless-in-Denver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-reveals-alarming-rates-of-youth-homeless-in-Denver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79fc61ff-b344-4fdf-a314-1824c37e4818 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:09:00 -0500 Study reveals alarming rates of youth homelessness in Denver
在化石中发现进化军备竞赛的最古老证据美国自然历史博物馆的研究人员领导的一项新研究呈现了进化军备竞赛化石记录中已知最古老的例子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Oldest-evidence-of-evolutionary-arms-race-found-in-fossils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Oldest-evidence-of-evolutionary-arms-race-found-in-fossils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99226848-9b6b-411a-a833-04a8eccc5d54 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 19:03:00 -0500 Oldest evidence of evolutionary arms race found in fossils
先进的成像技术可检测高危前列腺癌中未确诊的转移加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，许多高危非转移性激素敏感型前列腺癌病例可能比之前认为的更为晚期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Advanced-imaging-technology-detects-undiagnosed-metastases-in-high-risk-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Advanced-imaging-technology-detects-undiagnosed-metastases-in-high-risk-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff7f5c6-81e7-4e6b-9ef6-13626f22ef2a Fri, 03 Jan 2025 12:15:30 -0500 Advanced imaging technology detects undiagnosed metastases in high-risk prostate cancer
对帕金森病患者失控运动的新见解亚利桑那大学的研究人员对帕金森病患者面临的最常见并发症之一提出了新见解：经过多年治疗后出现的无法控制的运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-insights-into-uncontrollable-movements-in-Parkinsons-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-insights-into-uncontrollable-movements-in-Parkinsons-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c486b8fd-10db-434e-8fb6-1963c2ee0098 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 12:11:03 -0500 New insights into uncontrollable movements in Parkinson's disease patients
探索可避免的痴呆症患者从疗养院到医院的转移对于许多疗养院居民来说，去医院可能是一次不愉快的经历——；这让他们感到困惑和压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Exploring-avoidable-nursing-home-to-hospital-transfers-for-dementia-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Exploring-avoidable-nursing-home-to-hospital-transfers-for-dementia-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d322fd03-5450-48fd-8bc6-f57f2f95de1e Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:43:51 -0500 Exploring avoidable nursing home-to-hospital transfers for dementia patients
国家糖尿病预防计划有助于降低医疗费用在美国，大约三分之一的成年人患有糖尿病前期，即血糖水平高于正常水平，但不足以诊断为糖尿病的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/National-Diabetes-Prevention-Program-helps-reduce-medical-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/National-Diabetes-Prevention-Program-helps-reduce-medical-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68b8ab11-bc9c-4e20-a676-274e3ff85770 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:31:03 -0500 National Diabetes Prevention Program helps reduce medical costs
以患者为中心的报告有助于减少担忧并增进对测试结果的理解2021 年 4 月，《21 世纪治愈法案》中的一项条款生效，要求所有医学检查结果一旦可用，应立即发布到患者的电子病历中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Patient-centered-reports-help-reduce-worry-and-improve-understanding-of-test-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Patient-centered-reports-help-reduce-worry-and-improve-understanding-of-test-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79f7fa6d-a919-4db8-801e-da73adcc9523 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:27:35 -0500 Patient-centered reports help reduce worry and improve understanding of test results
研究强调诊断测试在大流行应对中的重要性COVID-19 大流行凸显了检测对于疾病准备和应对的重要性，约翰霍普金斯大学应用物理实验室 (APL) 和合作者团队的新研究强调了这一原则。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-highlights-the-importance-of-diagnostic-tests-in-pandemic-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Study-highlights-the-importance-of-diagnostic-tests-in-pandemic-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a509e25a-502e-4153-8f01-cbf79000cfda Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:22:11 -0500 Study highlights the importance of diagnostic tests in pandemic response
科学家发现抗击疟疾的新型抗体美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 研究人员今天在《科学》杂志上发表的一项研究表明，一类新型抗体可以与疟疾寄生虫中以前未靶向的部分结合，从而可能带来新的预防方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Scientists-identify-novel-antibodies-for-fighting-malaria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Scientists-identify-novel-antibodies-for-fighting-malaria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dbaf026-16f9-4081-b2cd-d141b4e3601f Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:16:21 -0500 Scientists identify novel antibodies for fighting malaria
解决为阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症患者提供医疗服务的障碍Kosali Simon，博士、文学硕士，保罗 H. 奥尼尔公共与环境事务学院教授，​​Regenstrief 研究所研究科学家；芝加哥大学教务长 Katherine Baicker 博士将共同领导一项预计耗资近 1600 万美元的美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 国家老龄化研究所 (NIA) 项目，该项目旨在探索为阿尔茨海默病及相关疾病患者提供医疗保健服务的关键方面痴呆症（ADRD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Addressing-barriers-to-healthcare-delivery-for-people-with-Alzheimers-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Addressing-barriers-to-healthcare-delivery-for-people-with-Alzheimers-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd02cb18-f760-4471-88d8-a5719c3b6941 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 11:12:00 -0500 Addressing barriers to healthcare delivery for people with Alzheimer's disease and related dementias
